channel.title: Removing objects such as doors and trees
channel.description:
Hey guys, how do I remove doors and/or trees. maybe there is a method in one of my .java files on removing doors or trees, but I can't find it if it does exist.
So, I really need to remove ONE door, and it doesn't remove if I put it under deletethatobject.
Also, someone told me to spawn a 'null' on the coordinates of the door, how would I do this?
Any help would be greatly appreciated. ~ Dai

item.title: Removing objects such as doors and trees
item.dc:creator: @Daikenkai Daikenkai
item.description:
@Daikenkai wrote:

Thanks so much, mate. I got it working now, and I didn’t even have to work in any .java files.

I would have never figured this out myself.

Hail

Thanks
~ Dai

Read full topic
item.source: Removing objects such as doors and trees

item.title: Removing objects such as doors and trees
item.dc:creator: @_jeba `jeba
item.description:
@_jeba wrote:

At the top or doors.cfg it should say something like this

coord coord id face open close

first you need to put the X coord of the door your trying to open, then Y coord… then you need the doors ID (use mopar, silab or Webber to view all of them)

then face is what your door will be facing when it hasnt been touched.

open speaks for its self, same with close.

Read full topic
item.source: Removing objects such as doors and trees

item.title: Removing objects such as doors and trees
item.dc:creator: @Daikenkai Daikenkai
item.description:
@Daikenkai wrote:

I am using Pwnscape. (Source + Client). I have no troubles removing objects, just doors.
I don’t even think doors go under the title ‘objects’. i think they go under their own title.
So, if i wanted to make them actually open, what do I do?
Please, I don’t want to be told exactly what to do, just how to do it.

Sigh, most the high rep mopar guys are faggots...

Too true

Thanks
~ Dai

Read full topic
item.source: Removing objects such as doors and trees

item.title: Removing objects such as doors and trees
item.dc:creator: @_jeba `jeba
item.description:
@_jeba wrote:

Sigh, most the high rep mopar guys are faggots…

I don’t think you can remove doors, but you can make it so they;

  1. remain open
  2. open and close regularly.

As for object deleting, what server base are you on?

Read full topic

well, I have a doorhandler.java.

So, how would I make the door work???

(I am new to objects).
